Title: Earshot
Plot: After a close encounter with a mouthless demon Buffy is infected with the demon's blood and she gains the ability to hear people's thoughts. Her new found ability at first is good for cheating on schoolwork, but when the voices continue to flood her mind, she realises that she cannot control the power.    While the gang tries to track down a would-be killer at the school, Buffy is slowly going crazy from the inability to block the noise from the minds of the people around her.
GuestStars: Justin Doran, Wendy Worthington, Robert Arce, Molly Bryant, Rich Muller, Jay Michael Ferguson, Ethan Erickson, Keram Malicki-Sanchez, Lauren E. Roman, Larry Bagby, Kristine Sutherland, Alexis Denisof, Danny Stron
